results.content: He's very open and honest and easy to follow. I was nervous when he said we would be designing our own blogs as part of the course, but at the end of module 1 I have two pages of notes, a brain brimming with ideas, and I actually got excited when he said homework!

response.content: Thank you Amy I have tried to give people everything they need to setup a travel blog but also more importantly how to research and understand good business basics.

results.content:
I would definitely recommend this course if you want to put together your own blog. My blog wasn't a travel blog but I just adapted the content to fit my own. I went from only being able to start setting up a basic static webpage and then I got stuck on what to do next, to knowing how to create a dynamic website and blog with video and sign up boxes. I was given idea for colours and layouts. This course took me being stuck in an airport to flying high in the sky. My blog still isn't perfect but it is a beginning and I now have the tools to make the changes.
Jackie Fletcher
www.jackieonketo.com

response.content: Jackie you are a legend, it is exactly what I want people to do and what I wanted to achieve with this course - thank you for your review.

results.content:
If you are keen to start a blog, desperate even, but feel overwhelmed by a lack of IT knowledge and technical expertise, then John’s course is the one for you.  His methodical and structured approach to learning and teaching ensures the delivery of information is easily digestible, provided at a pace that’s amenable to acquiring proficiency at each step of the creative and technical journey.  His kind, empathic and jovial disposition allay fear and anxiety, and provide needed entertainment along the way.  The structure and content are perceptively arranged, sequenced logically to abet the development of skills necessary to create a blog by course completion.  It was exactly the thing I needed to get started.  

I’d put off starting my travel blog for a long time, but with John’s expertise and support, I was able to create it.   Ergo, I highly recommend taking this course.  It’s a surefire way of getting your blog up and running in no time at all.  Thank you, John!

response.content: Many thanks Ben for your review.  I am so please you enjoyed the course!
response.content_html: Many thanks Ben for your review. I am so please you enjoyed the course!
